pages.text: Boil is the kg of fire and water release. It currently contains 2 moves being corrosion mist and unrivaled strength.

pages.title: corrosion mist
pages.text: corrosion mist is a move that allows the user to charge up a large amount of steam that is then released in front of the user, the size, duration, damage and chakra cost of this move is dependant on the amount charged.
